strings.affinity:
From now on,
no matter what happens,
don't forget me...
strings.description: A young woman who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Rem is a student of Akademeia and an expert in magic who was promoted directly from Class Seventh to Class Zero. Unfortunately, she contracted an incurable disease during her infancy that she currently represses with the aid of a particulary potent medicine. Its sideeffects, however, are the source behind her incessant coughing and the horrible pain she endures night after night. Regardless of the true state of her health, Rem always does her best to act normal around her classmates.
strings.fusion:
Leave it to me!
I'll do my best not to let you down!
strings.summon:
My name is Rem Tokimiya.
I look forward to working with you.

strings.evolution:
I won't let anyone die anymore.
That is how I feel.
strings.affinity:
From now on,
no matter what happens,
don't forget me...
strings.description: A young woman who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Rem and Machina were great childhood friends, and even when they eventually parted their own ways, fate brought them together once again at Akademeia. Knowing her life will be a short one due to her incurable illness, she chooses to use whatever little time she has left to defend her homeland from the front lines as a cadet. Although she tries her best not to worry those around her, lying is not her strong suit, and thus Machina and Seven ultimately discover the truth regarding her decaying state of health.
strings.fusion:
*Cough* *cough*
I-I'm all right, really!
I'm sorry to have troubled you.
strings.summon:
If we put together a girl's party
surely everyone would come, yeah?
